item.title: Scott Weiland's Family: 'Don't Glorify This Tragedy'
item.description:
Scott Weiland's Family: 'Don't Glorify This Tragedy'

Mary Forsberg Weiland is the mother of the late singer Scott Weiland's teenage children, Noah, 15, and Lucy, 13. She wrote this with their help in the days after his death on Dec 3rd. Sidebar Read Stone Temple Pilots' Open Letter to Scott Weiland " December 3rd, 2015 is not the day Scott Weiland died.

item.title: The Man Who Put Rap On The MTV Map Passes At 59
item.description:
The Man Who Put Rap On The MTV Map Passes At 59

The modern image of hip-hop owes much of its evolution to the coverage and presentation of its artists and culture made possible by MTV, more specifically, the show Yo! MTV Raps.

item.title: 2016 Grammy Nominations Announced
item.description:
2016 Grammy Nominations Announced

The 58th Annual Grammy Awards announce the nominations. The 58th Annual Grammy Awards are going down on February 15th, at the Staples Center in Los Angeles. item.title: Chance the Rapper Blasts Spike Lee's 'Chi-Raq': It's 'Exploitive and Problematic'
item.description:
Chance the Rapper Blasts Spike Lee's 'Chi-Raq': It's 'Exploitive and Problematic'

Chance the Rapper has a bone to pick with Spike Lee over the content of Lee's latest film, " Chi-Raq." Chance took to Twitter Friday morning to criticize Lee's modern re-telling of "Lysistrata" by Aristophanes, a Classical Greek play about women withholding sex from their husbands in order to stop their fighting.
